method.name: effect
method.desc: Uses a specific effect on an element (without the show/hide logic).

argument.name: effect
argument.desc: The effect to be used. Possible values: 'blind', 'bounce', 'clip', 'drop', 'explode', 'fold', 'highlight', 'puff', 'pulsate', 'scale', 'shake', 'size', 'slide', 'transfer'.

argument.name: options
argument.desc: A object/hash including specific options for the effect.

argument.name: speed
argument.desc: A string representing one of the three predefined speeds ("slow", "normal", or "fast") or the number of milliseconds to run the animation (e.g. 1000).

argument.name: callback
argument.desc: A function that is called after the effect is completed.

method.name: addClass
method.desc: Adds the specified class to each of the set of matched elements with an optional transition between the states.

argument.name: classNames
argument.desc: One CSS class to add to the elements.

argument.name: duration
argument.desc: A string representing one of the three predefined speeds ("slow", "normal", or "fast") or the number of milliseconds to run the animation (e.g. 1000).

argument.name: callback
argument.desc: A function that is called after the effect is completed.

method.name: removeClass
method.desc: Removes all or specified class from each of the set of matched elements with an optional transition between the states.

argument.name: classNames
argument.desc: CSS classes to remove from the elements.

argument.name: duration
argument.desc: A string representing one of the three predefined speeds ("slow", "normal", or "fast") or the number of milliseconds to run the animation (e.g. 1000).

argument.name: callback
argument.desc: A function that is called after the effect is completed.

method.name: toggleClass
method.desc: The enhanced toggle method optionally accepts jQuery UI advanced effects. Uses a specific effect on an element to toggle the element if the first argument is an effect string.

argument.name: effect
argument.desc: The effect to be used. Possible values: 'blind', 'clip', 'drop', 'explode', 'fold', 'puff', 'slide', 'scale', 'size', 'pulsate'.

argument.name: options
argument.desc: A object/hash including specific options for the effect.

argument.name: speed
argument.desc: A string representing one of the three predefined speeds ("slow", "normal", or "fast") or the number of milliseconds to run the animation (e.g. 1000).

argument.name: callback
argument.desc: A function that is called after the effect is completed.

method.name: switchClass
method.desc: Switches from the class defined in the first argument to the class defined as second argument, using an optional transition.

argument.name: remove
argument.desc: The CSS class that will be removed.

argument.name: add
argument.desc: The CSS class that will be added.

argument.name: duration
argument.desc: A string representing one of the three predefined speeds ("slow", "normal", or "fast") or the number of milliseconds to run the animation (e.g. 1000).
